thread.title: Emma O'Brien
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Emma O'Brien

author: Emma O'Brien
title: Emma O'Brien
text: Rob Dabner arrived on Saturday to an emergency which opened a whole can of worms regarding the wiring in our home. He was calm, friendly and a pleasure to deal with throughout the 3 days he spent working meticulously (& close to 12 hr days) to rectify our dubious electrics. Robs colleague Stuart and apprentice Tom also joined the project, all 3 were hardworking & friendly and I totally trusted them to get the job done, as a busy mum of 3 this meant so much. Expensive but worth every penny for the peace of mind & would highly recommend.
